steps.name: test_successful_creation
steps.assertions:
Assumed Payload: 
{
  "status" : 201,
  "body" : {
    "id" : "$NOT.NULL",
    "firstName" : "John",
    "lastName" : "Doe"
  }
}
Assertion Errors: 
Assertion jsonPath '$.body.id' with actual value 'null' did not match the expected value 'NOT NULL'
Assertion jsonPath '$.body.firstName' with actual value 'null' did not match the expected value 'John'
Assertion jsonPath '$.status' with actual value '400' did not match the expected value '201'
Assertion jsonPath '$.body.lastName' with actual value 'null' did not match the expected value 'Doe'
